DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate long-term efficacy and safety of pregabalin (150 to 600mg/day) as adjunctive treatment in patients with partial seizures.
DOC.brief_title: Pregabalin In Partial Seizures Extension Study
DOC.criteria: met the inclusion/exclusion criteria for A0081005 have completed the 21week study and have shown a significant clinical response and wish to continue treatment Having a treatable cause of seizure. Having a progressive neurological or systemic disorder
